body.instruction: Select the image of each emperor to learn more about what they did during their reign.

front.content: Emperor Otho portrait bust©akg-images / ImageQuest 2021

back.content:
I am known for:
  • ruling Rome for three months total (January–April, 69 CE)
  • battling against Vitellius’ legions in Lower Germania
